prompt: tell me about youth challeng international
completion: Together with our partners, YCI develops creative, market-ready solutions that catapult youth around the world to succeed and prosper.

prompt: how much waste does Toronto produce every year?
completion: Every year, the City of Toronto manages close to 900,000 tonnes (almost two billion pounds) of waste. This requires money, energy, and resources and takes up valuable landfill space. Waste reduction should always be top of mind as the less waste produced, the less there is to manage.
